attributes.action: Make companies advertise in large print when they reduce package sizes
attributes.additional_details:
Companies are only to happy to advertise in large print when they are giving extra content for free or on special offer.

They should be made to advertise just as clearly when they reduce the packaging size and reduce the food sizes for the same price.

Cadburys have just reduced the size of their chocolate bars, but kept the price the same. This should be clearly advertised on the bar.
